column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Kyoshi says : " When they came to the neck of the peninsula where we lived , he demanded our immediate surrender .
#Text=" Kyoshi says : " I created Kyoshi Island so my people could be safe from invaders .
#Text=" Aang says : " So , what just happened ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Uhhh ... you kind of confessed .
#Text=Sorry .
#Text=" Tong says : " And I find you ... Guilty !
#Text=Bring out the Wheel of Punishment !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle ... I thought a lot about what you said .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You did ?
#Text=Good , good .
#Text=" Zuko says : " It 's helped me realize something .
#Text=We no longer have anything to gain by traveling together .
#Text=I need to find my own way .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Wait !
#Text=" Guard says : " The accused will now spin the Wheel of Punishment to determine his sentence .
#Text=" Aang says : " I said I would face justice , so I will .
#Text=" Villager says : " Come on , torture machine !
#Text=" Villager # 2 says : " Eaten by bears !
#Text=" Villager # 3 says : " Razor pit !
#Text=" Katara says : " Community service !
#Text=Please stop on community service !
#Text=" Guard says : " Looks like it 's " boiled in oil . "
#Text="
